title: Tuesday
body:
Munday was yesterday. 
Eventually it will be wunesday.
Later on it will be thuesday
Fruday follows thuesday
suturday
then sunday

Discuss:

replies.body:
I believe it's Tirdas today.
Morndas was yesterday.
Tomorrow will be Middas.
Then it will be Turdas.
Followed by Fredas.
Loredas comes after that.
And ends/begins on Sundas.
